text: @narendramodi Please play awareness message regarding COVID19 in garbage collection vans instead of playing garbage songs. This time to is to aware people of india at any cost. @MoHFW_INDIA @sudhirchaudhary @RubikaLiyaquat @PMOIndia @JM_Scindia @ChouhanShivraj @SrBachchan @AnupamPKher

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
